alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 2:57PM CDT until May 31 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN COUNTY... At 257 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Cochrane Rec Area, or 15 miles southeast of Clear Lake, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hendricks. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
